about_the_game:
GodMod is an asymmetric, cross platform, action survival online multiplayer game designed for up to 8 players, wherein 2 among 8 players will be chosen randomly to eliminate the other 6 players.

  • 2 exterminators are overpowered but outnumbered.
  • 6 parasites are powerless but not hopeless to escape in order to survive.
  • Outwit your opponents by using gadgets in a well planned situation.
  • Built-in chat function for communication.


The patients in the so-called facility weren't crazy, but were void of sanity. The scientists’ current project consisted of kidnapping people from all over the world, from different statuses and gender, and subjecting them under their manipulation.

Like a hamster put into one maze-like space. All of them had the same electronic band over their eyes that they can’t remove because it was attached to their spine. The minute the device was turned on, they were no longer the owner of their bodies, but the people who control them through the app.


The rules of the Experiment were simple. Perform tasks. Evade the Exterminators. It is up to you whether you want to help other Parasites’ escape by picking them up when they are down. But be careful, the Exterminator can be lurking somewhere in the shadows.



Outwit your opponents by using drones in a well planned situation. Use drones to distract, hide and confuse the exterminators, but be weary as exterminators have drones to aid them too.

content_descriptors.notes:
Exterminators shoot Parasites with a gun.
Blood splatters and trail.

name: GodMod

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750 | NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: GodMod is an asymmetric, cross platform, action survival online multiplayer game designed for up to 8 players, wherein 2 among 8 players will be chosen randomly to eliminate the other 6 players.
